page.title: 03VILLAGE INDUSTRIES
page.content: {CERES ENGINERS: We went to visit Ceres Engineers on the 26th of May 1985.Ceres Engineers is part of{Rippin Structures}who make large{agricultural sheds.}The firm employs{13 men}3 of which make steel girders and the other 10 actually build the large sheds on the site. {SECOND-HAND CAR SALES: We looked at a small second-hand car dealer's business which buys mostly second-hand cars,{fixes them, sprays {them and sells them.}The owner has been running the business for over 5 years and says "You need a lot of experience". He enjoys his job and sells an average of{96 cars a year. Every car needs an{M.O.T. Certificate {and a Registration document. }The owner has lived in Ceres for only 5 years but admits he is not involved in the community life of the village.
